file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 25-23-02-04 - SKIRTING LINING PANELS - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL SKIRTING LINING PANELS - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-145 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove/install the skirting lining panels. B. The skirting lining panels are installed below the sidewall panels along the length of the passenger cabin. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ACFT MODEL(S) 25-23-02-000-801-A SKIRTING LINING PANELS - REMOVAL EMB-145 ACFT MODEL(S) SKIRTING LINING PANELS - INSTALLA- 25-23-02-400-801-A EMB-145 TION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General CONFIG-1 25-23-02 Page 1 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-23-02-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-145 2. SKIRTING LINING PANELS - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to remove the skirting lining panels. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 25-21-01-000-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-26-03-000-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-26-04-000-801-A/400 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-013-A (1) Remove the passengers seats, as applicable (AMM TASK 25-21-01-000-801-A/400). (2) Remove the emergency equipment stowage unit, if applicable (AMM TASK 25-26-03-000-801-A/400). (3) Remove the LH wardrobe, if applicable (AMM TASK 25-26-04-000-801-A/400). J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-013-A (1) Remove the skirting lining panel assembly (1) (Figure 401, sheets 1 and 2, DET. C) as follows: EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 CONFIG-1 25-23-02 Page 2 of 7 Rev 53 - Oct 31/17 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (a) Remove the screws (2) and washers (3) that attach the skirting lining panel assembly (1). (b) Remove the skirting lining panel assembly (1). (2) Remove the skirting lining panel assembly (4) (Figure 401, sheets 1 and 2, DET. D) as follows: (a) Remove the screws (5) and washers (6) that attach the access panel assembly (7). (b) Remove the screws (8) that attach the skirting lining panel assembly (4) at the duct restrictor assembly (9). (c) Remove the screws (10) and washers (11) that attach the skirting lining panel assembly (4). (d) Remove the skirting lining panel assembly (4). (3) Remove the skirting lining panel assembly (12) (Figure 401, sheets 1 and 2, DET. E) as follows: (a) Remove the shroud (13), if applicable. (b) Loosen the clamp (14) and remove the hose (15) from the skirting lining panel assembly (12). (c) Remove the screws (16) and washers (17) that attach the skirting lining panel assembly (12). (d) Remove the skirting lining panel assembly (12). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 CONFIG-1 25-23-02 Page 3 of 7 Rev 53 - Oct 31/17 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-145 Skirting Lining Panels - Removal/Installation Figure 401 - Sheet 2 1. SKIRTING LINING PANEL 3. WASHER 2. SCREW DET. C F 4. SKIRTING LINING PANEL 11. WASHER DET. D 10. SCREW 8. SCREW 5. SCREW 6. WASHER 7. ACCESS PANEL 9. DUCT ASSEMBLY 14. CLAMP RESTRICTOR DET. F ASSEMBLY 13. SHROUD 15. HOSE 12. SKIRTING LINING PANEL 16. SCREW 17. WASHER 145AMM250050.MCE DET. E EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 CONFIG-1 25-23-02 Page 5 of 7 Rev 53 - Oct 31/17 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-23-02-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-145 3. SKIRTING LINING PANELS - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to install the skirting lining panels. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 25-21-01-400-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-26-03-400-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-26-04-400-801-A/400 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-013-A (1) Install the skirting lining panel assembly (1) (Figure 401, sheets 1 and 2, DET. C) as follows: (a) Put the skirting lining panel assembly (1) in position. (b) Install the screws (2) and washers (3) to attach the skirting lining panel assembly (1). (2) Install the skirting lining panel assembly (4) (Figure 401, sheets 1 and 2, DET. D) as follows: (a) Put the skirting lining panel assembly (4) in position. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 CONFIG-1 25-23-02 Page 6 of 7 Rev 53 - Oct 31/17 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (b) Install the screws (8) that attach the skirting lining panel assembly (4) at the duct restrictor assembly (9). (c) Install the screws (10) and washers (11) to attach the skirting lining panel assembly (4). (d) Install the screws (5) and washers (6) to attach the access panel assembly (7). (3) Install the skirting lining panel assembly (12) (Figure 401, sheets 1 and 2, DET. E) as follows: (a) Put the skirting lining panel assembly (12) in position. (b) Install the screws (16) and washers (17) to attach the skirting lining panel assembly (12). (c) Tighten the clamp (14) to attach the hose (15) at the skirting lining panel assembly (12). (d) If you removed the shroud (13), install it again. J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-013-A (1) If you removed the LH wardrobe, install it again (AMM TASK 25-26-04-400-801-A/ 400). (2) If you removed the emergency equipment stowage unit, install it again (AMM TASK 25-26-03-400-801-A/400). (3) Install the removed passenger seats (AMM TASK 25-21-01-400-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 CONFIG-1 25-23-02 Page 7 of 7 Rev 53 - Oct 31/17 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
